summary: This movie chronicles how Chetan met his wife and the difficulties they faced due to their cultural differences.
cast: Arjun Kapoor|Alia Bhatt|Amrita Singh|Revathi|Ronit Roy|Shivkumar Subramaniam|Sharang Natarajan|Swarna Bharat|Sanjay Bhatia|Madhu Anand Chandhock|Hemang Dave|Achint Kaur|Dilip Merala|Neil Shah|Aru Krishansh Verma
title: 2 States
